name: Vegan Rice Kale Pilaf - Rice Pulao/Pilaf with Kale, Cashews, Vegetables
description: Easy Rice Pilaf with veggies, nuts and kale. Use other grains of choice. Vegan gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon Pav bhaji masala  (or garam masala or Biryani masala or other spice blend of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak rice in enough water to cover and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak rice in enough water to cover and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or saucepan, add oil and heat over medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or saucepan, add oil and heat over medium.

recipeInstructions.text: When the oil is hot, add cumin seeds and cook for half a minute or until they change color.
recipeInstructions.name: When the oil is hot, add cumin seeds and cook for half a minute or until they change color.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the bay leaf, green chili and garlic and cook for a minute till garlic is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the bay leaf, green chili and garlic and cook for a minute till garlic is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the onions, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the onions, mix and cook for 2-3 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cashews, bell peppers, carrots, kale stems, any other veggies, and the spice blend. Mix and cook on low-medium, covered, for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cashews, bell peppers, carrots, kale stems, any other veggies, and the spice blend. Mix and cook on low-medium, covered, for 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the kale leaves, half the salt and mix well. Cover for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the kale leaves, half the salt and mix well. Cover for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the drained rice, water and salt. give it a mix and cook covered. 2 whistles in the pressure cooker. (2 minutes once the pressure reaches).
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the drained rice, water and salt. give it a mix and cook covered. 2 whistles in the pressure cooker. (2 minutes once the pressure reaches).

recipeInstructions.text: If cooking in a saucepan, cook over medium heat for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium low and cook for 10 to 12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: If cooking in a saucepan, cook over medium heat for 5 minutes. Reduce heat to medium low and cook for 10 to 12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with pomegranate, cilantro and lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with pomegranate, cilantro and lemon juice.
